manage_app.segments.disable_confirmation:
Disabling segments will DELETE ALL segments and REMOVE ALL users from segments.
All segment managers will have their segment manager permission revoked.
Segment settings will not be stored.

The following features will be restored to their settings prior to segments being enabled:

Subscriptions based on segments will be deleted ('$t(common.everyone_in_org)' subscriptions will be retained), this cannot be undone and the information will not be stored.
However, users will continue to follow all the same sites and people that they followed prior to disabling.
Enabling segments will take some time, during which employees will be locked out of the app. If possible this should be done outside of normal working hours.
